Desc.entry: Does not provide any direct screening services but has a national role in developing local programmes throughout the country. The office can answer queries from members of the public regarding breast, cervical and bowel cancer screening and prostate cancer risk management.

DisabledAccess.entry: Some parts of the building have wheelchair access and disabled toilet, please contact for details

ContactName.entry: Catherine Davison, Information Manager/John Davy, Corporate Services Manager
